document.full_text: fourth seed andy murray screamed with delight instead of pain after pulling off a five-set comeback win over serb viktor troicki on tuesday thanks to his remarkable tenacity and some help from a blushing ball boy.
document.title: murray's tenacity knows no bounds
lines_and_colors: fourth seed andy murray screamed with delight instead of pain after pulling off a five-set comeback win over serb viktor troicki on tuesday thanks to his remarkable tenacity and some help from a blushing ball boy.
